src:
秀腹肌「性感冰塊盒」　謝祖武曝：太太看我的眼神都有愛
06 Nov 2019, 03:20 by 張詠淇
「麻辣鮮師」磊哥脫了，謝祖武昨（5日）在粉專曝光最新代言照，照片中單手扯開緊身背心，秀出腹部上的性感冰塊盒，尺度大開讓粉絲們直呼太犯規！
謝祖武自爆私下曾一度失控爆肉，養出厚厚鮪魚肚被路人譏笑，讓他很久都不敢穿合身的衣服，深怕一不小心就會擠出游泳圈。直到最近找到提升代謝的飲食方法後，終於成功回到精實的體態，他開心的在粉專宣布六塊肌成就達成，證明自己就算年過50也能有青春肉體。謝祖武得意的說：「之前爆肉時，洗完澡太太都開玩笑叫我快點穿衣服！最近不只嫌我包太緊，連看我的眼神都有愛，這種感覺真的超棒的！」
時常被稱讚和19年前的麻辣鮮師一模一樣的謝祖武，自爆曾有過一段爆肉黑歷史，被路人直呼「你看麻辣鮮師爆肥耶！」讓他當下超尷尬。他更幽默的表示：「那時候覺得自己很像豬八戒投胎，連太太都不看我一眼，因為一眼根本看不完。」為了不想再被說「爆肥」，謝祖武開始改變飲食習慣、空出時間運動、餐前跟餐後再搭配提升代謝的輔助食品，短時間就成功從7字頭降回6字頭，剷平鮪魚肚！
謝祖武在代言照中大秀好身材，不只白色緊身背心讓線條若隱若現，六塊腹肌跟緊實的麒麟臂都讓人看不出是52歲的大叔！他邊拍照還一邊調皮的問攝影師：「需要再拉高一點嗎？」被問到老婆看到這一系列性感照的感想，謝祖武得意地表示現在自己是家裡的男神，老婆時不時就會「抱緊處理」。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 03:19
text:
Xiu abdominal muscle "sexy ice box" Xie Zuwu exposure: my wife sees my eyes have love
06 Nov 2019, 03:20 by Zhang Yiqi
"Spicy fresh teacher" Lei brother took off, Xie Zuwu yesterday (5th) in the powder special exposure of the latest endorsement photos, photos in one hand to open the tight vest, show the sexy ice box on the abdomen, scale open to let fans call Too foul!
Xie Zuwu blew himself out of control and broke the meat. He raised a thick squid belly and was laughed at by passers-by. He had been afraid to wear a fitted suit for a long time, and he was afraid that he would squeeze out the swim ring if he accidentally. Until recently, I found a way to improve my metabolism. I finally managed to return to a lean body. He was happy to announce that the six-piece muscle achievement was achieved in the powder, and that he could have a youthful body even if he was over 50 years old. Xie Zuwu said proudly: "Before the meat broke out, the wife who was taking a shower made a joke and told me to dress quickly! Recently, I don’t think that my bag is too tight. Even my eyes have love, this feeling is really great! "
It is often praised that Xie Zuwu, who is exactly the same as the spicy fresh teacher 19 years ago, has had a history of blasting black meat. He was called by the passers-by, "You see the spicy fresh teacher!" He said more humorously: "At that time, I felt that I was like a pig and gave birth to a baby. Even my wife didn't look at me because I couldn't see it at all." In order not to be said to be "exploding fat," Xie Zuwu began to change his eating habits and vacated. Time exercise, pre-meal and after-meal with the auxiliary foods that promote metabolism, in a short time, it will be successfully returned from the 7-character back to the 6-head, shovel the squid!
Xie Zuwu showed great figure in the endorsement, not only the white tight vest made the lines looming, the six abdominal muscles and the tight Kirin arm made people can not see the 52-year-old uncle! While he was taking pictures, he asked the photographer naughtyly: "Do you need to pull up a little higher?" When asked about his wife's feelings of seeing this series of sexy photos, Xie Zuwu proudly said that he is now a male god at home, and his wife will from time to time. "Hold the handle."
Update time|2019.11.06 03:19
